segments.text: I can't help but feel a pit in my stomach watching the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches for the cookie jar makes it look so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he loses his balance and falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister’s eager expression is adorable, yet it amplifies my worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised that neither of the children seems to care about the fact that they're breaking the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like they’re in their own world, oblivious to the risks around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how unaware the woman is of the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
